title: Unable to queue for ranked games
body: When I attempt to queue for a ranked game, the client states I do not have 16 champions and so cannot queue. I have 93 champions. Any suggestions on how to fix this? I'm trying to raise my rank for the rewards and I have limited play time.

replies.body: Additionally, I can queue for unranked/normal games, but when it comes time to accept the ready check and I click on it, it turns into a black screen and doesn't pull up champ select. Additionally, it appears to time out and goes back in the queue automatically. I've been in queue for over an hour with it automatically repeating itself, the time never going far beyond 11 minutes (not accurately tracking), and never getting kicked out of queue.

It sounds like there may be an issue with your route to the server. To ensure your local network settings are good, work through our [connection guide.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)

Let me know if those steps worked for you.
Excuse me, but i can rank in my alternative account...
Im also unable to rank cause this same reason, please help {{summoner:3}}

A lot of posts that were posted about 3-4 hours ago have dev responses. How long should I wait for a response when considering some of the questions being asked are comparative, but the answers that were provided do not fit the specifics of my situation (such as number of champs owned)?
